DOC.brief_summary: The main purpose study determine plasma central nervious system pharmacokinetics dexketoprofen etoricoxib . The secondary aim ass effect concentration interleukin 6 , prostaglandin E2 proinflammatory marker plasma cerebrospinal fluid . Thirdly , investigator aim evaluate efficacy postoperative pain treatment .
